message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but $90 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $75 for it. Can you meet me in the middle at $82.50?

Hi Bob, I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $82.50. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counteroffer at $85. Can we meet in the middle at this price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $85 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $80 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $80. I'll counteroffer at $87.50. This is my final offer, as I'm getting close to considering selling it to John for $80.

I understand you're getting close to considering selling it to John, but I'm still interested in buying it from you. I'm willing to meet you at $82, which is right in the middle of our previous offers. Can you consider this price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to sell it to you for $82. I'll counteroffer at $84. This is my last offer, as I'm getting close to giving up on the deal.

I understand you're getting close to giving up, but I'm still interested in buying the product from you. I'm willing to meet you at $80, which is the price I've been willing to pay from the start. Can you consider this price?
